name: Kylo Ren
subtitle: Bound By The Force
text: Power Action - Move 1 shield from this character to another character. Then, if you moved that shield to a hero, deal 1 damage to a character. [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. If any of this damage is blocked, reroll this die instead of removing it.

name: Maul
subtitle: Skilled Duelist
text: Power Action - Reroll one of this character's character or upgrade dice. You may discard a card from your hand to reroll that die again. If that die is showing melee damage ([melee]), you may remove it to deal damage equal to its value to 2 characters.

name: Nightsister Zombie
text: Indirect damage ([indirect]) dealt to you must be assigned to this character last. After you activate this character, you may spot another witch to deal 1 damage to a character that has a curse on them.

name: Old Daka
subtitle: Nightsister Necromancer
text: After this character is defeated, set each Nightsister Zombie you control aside. Power Action - Spend 1 resource to add a set-aside Nightsister Zombie ([SoH]4) to your team exhausted, or 2 Nightsister Zombies exhausted instead if this character is elite.

name: Chancellor's Edict
text:
After this downgrade is played, remove all shields from attached character.
After attached character is defeated, you may give a character 2 shields.

name: Hex
text: Action - Exhaust this downgrade to remove one of attached character's character die showing a blank ([blank]).

flavor: "Mine at last!" <cite>Emperor Palpatine</cite>
name: Sinister Ruse
text: Reveal a random card in an opponent's hand and deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to them equal to the cost of the revealed card.

name: Order 66
text: Each of your opponent's characters gains Jedi. Before you draw your starting hand, shuffle up to 4 set-aside copies of Execute Order 66 ([SoH]27) into your deck.

flavor: "Awaken." <cite>Old Daka</cite>
name: Talisman of Resurrection
text: Witch character only. [special] - Gain 2 resources. Then you may spend resources equal to the point value of a defeated character to return it to play under you control.

flavor: "This station is now the ultimate power in the universe!"
name: Conan Motti
subtitle: Overconfident Officer
text: After you resolve this die showing a discard ([discard]), you may discard a card from your hand to remove a die.

flavor: "Defiance will be the death of you."
name: Gideon Hask
subtitle: Inferno Squad Commando
text: Power Action - If you control the battlefield, roll a trooper die on a card you control into your pool.

flavor: Their suits were designed to protect them from harsh environments, like the swamps of Mimban.
name: Mudtrooper
text: After you activate this character or a leader, you may reroll one of your dice showing a blank ([blank]).

name: Thrawn
subtitle: Grand Admiral
text: After you activate this character, you may look at the top 4 cards of a deck. Power Action - Reveal the top 4 cards of an opponent's deck. You may play an event revealed this way and spot that opponent's cards as if they were yours.

name: Counterintelligence
text: Spot a leader to look at an opponent's hand and place an event from it on top of their deck.

flavor: "Good soldiers follow orders." <cite>CT-5385</cite>
name: Execute Order 66
text: Remove all Jedi dice. For each die removed, deal 1 damage to its matching character.

name: Rally the Troops
text: Choose a character subtype. Then either reroll any number of dice that have that subtype or resolve 2 of your dice that have that subtype.

flavor: "I like to know the deeper meanings of the pieces I collect." <cite>Grand Admiral Thrawn</cite>
name: Cultural Records
text:
After a player plays a copy of a card set aside by this support, you may gain 1 resource or remove a die.
[special] - Look at an opponent's hand and set a card from it aside. Gain 1 action.

name: Separatist Embargo
text:
After you play this support, name a card.
Copies of the named card cannot be played.

flavor: "Victory and defeat are often determined by the smallest detail." <cite>Grand Admiral Thrawn</cite>
name: Mastermind
text: [special] - Name a card. Then reveal an opponent's hand and set each copy of the named card from it aside.

flavor: Multiple logic glitches and personality software corruption made him considerably deadlier than other protocol droids.
name: 4-LOM
subtitle: Calculating Criminal
text: After a bounty you control is discarded from play, you may add it to your hand.

flavor: "He's good — one of the best in the galaxy." <cite>Leia Organa</cite>
name: IG-88
subtitle: Single-Minded
text: Power Action - Resolve one of your bounty hunter dice showing ranged or melee damage against any number of characters that have a bounty on them.

name: Jango Fett
subtitle: Armed To The Teeth
text: Each equipment on this character does not count toward its upgrade limit. After you play an equipment on this character for the first time each round, you may gain 1 resource.

flavor: "Something isn't right. Zuckuss can sense it."
name: Zuckuss
subtitle: The Uncanny One
text: [special] - Gain 1 resource or trigger the "After attached character is defeated" ability on a bounty you control and discard it.

flavor: "By the authority of the Bounty Hunters' Guild, you are now my acquisition." <cite>Bossk</cite>
name: Bounty Hunters' Guild
text: Each of your opponents' characters has a +1 downgrade limit. After you play a bounty, you may activate one of your bounty hunters.

name: Mist Hunter
text: After you activate a bounty hunter you may activate this support. Then you may spot 4-LOM to reroll this die. You may spot Zuckuss to resolve this die.

name: Gauntlet Rockets
text: Bounty hunter only. Action - Choose a character. Turn this die to a side showing a value equal to or less than the number of bounties on that character.

name: Acceptable Losses
text: Defeat up to 3 of your characters to gain that many resources.

name: R2-D2
subtitle: Loyal Companion
text: You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. After you activate this character, you may turn one of your dice to its first side (the topmost box of its dice reference), or to any side instead if you spot C-3PO.

name: Rey
subtitle: Bound By The Force
text: Power Action - Reroll a character die or turn a villain character die to a side showing a value of 0. [special] - Give 2 shields to a character. Then, if that character has 3 or more shields, reroll this die instead of removing it.

flavor: "Sense the Force around you."
name: Yoda
subtitle: Mystical Mentor
text: This character has a +3 shield limit. The character's shields can be used to block damage dealt to apprentice characters.

name: Heroic Stand
text:
Play only if you control exactly one character and an opponent has 3 or more dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).
Ready a character.

name: Jedi Mind Trick
text: Spot a Jedi to choose a dice pool. An opponent splts the dice in that pool into 2 groups of any size. Either remove all dice in a group, or turn any number of dice in a group to sides of your choice.

flavor: "Island natives. They've kept up the Jedi structures since they've been built." <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
name: Caretaker Village
text: After an opponent's effect removes one of your apprentice or Jedi dice, you may exhaust this support to roll that die into your pool.

name: Jedi Lightsaber
text: After you play this upgrade, you may give attached character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if this upgrade is on a Jedi.

name: Yoda's Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade on Yoda, you may give him 1 shield.
[special] - Deal 1 unblockable damage to a character, or 2 unblockable damage instead if you remove 1 shield from attached character.

flavor: "Godspeed, Rebels."
name: Amilyn Holdo
subtitle: Vice Admiral
text: After this character is defeated, you may ready a vehicle. [special] - Gain 1 resource or play a vehicle from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2.

flavor: "R2-D2, you know better than to trust a strange computer."
name: C-3PO
subtitle: Perfect Gentleman
text: After you activate this character, you may resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1 if you spend 1 resource or spot R2-D2.

flavor: "Echo Station 3T8, we've spotted Imperial walkers!" <cite>Trey Callum</cite>
name: Hoth Trooper
text: After you activate this character, you may deal 1 damage to a ready character.

name: Lightspeed Assault
text: Defeat one of your leader characters and discard a vehicle you control. Then discar an opponent's vehicle from play and deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to them equal to the discarded vehicles' combined cost.

flavor: "Separatist forces have overrun our position!" <cite>Senator Bail Organa</cite>
name: Our Situation is Desperate
text: Spot any number of characters that have 3 or less remaining health to remove that many dice.

name: Take Control
text: Play a vehicle in an opponent's discard pile for free. After the upkeep phase begins, discard that vehicle from play.

flavor: "This is one of my most advanced designs! Fast, agile, and narrow attack profile. And it packs a punch!" <cite>Quarrie</cite>
name: B-Wing
text: After the action phase begins, you may activate this support.

name: Firm Resolve
text: After one of your characters is defeated or a vehicle you control is discarded, you may place 1 resource on this support. Action - Remove 1 resource from this support to turn a die to any side.

name: Chief Chirpa
subtitle: Bright Tree Village Elder
text: After setup, add a set-aside Ewok Warrior ([SoH]95) to your team. [special] - Deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent, or 3 indirect damage instead if you spot 4 Ewoks.

flavor: "Yub nub."
name: Ewok Warrior
text: Include only if you have a unique Ewok on your team. After you activate this character, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

flavor: "Some things never change."
name: Han Solo
subtitle: Old Swindler
text: Power Action - Turn one of your scoundrel dice showing a resource ([resource]) to any side. If it is a Wookiee die, you may resolve it for free.

flavor: "You're a jittery little thing, aren't you?" <cite>Leia Organa</cite>
name: Wicket
subtitle: Crafty Scout
text: After you activate this character, you may play a trap from your hand or discard pile.

name: Ensnare
text: After attached character is activated, you may discard this downgrade to deal damage to it equal to the number of its character and upgrade dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).

name: Net Trap
text: After attached character is activated, you may discard this downgrade to remove one of its character or upgrade dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).

flavor: Ewoks can take down even large enemies through the clever use of gravity and lumber.
name: Rolling Logs
text: After attached character is activated, you may discard this downgrade to reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice.

name: Ewok Ambush
text: Ambush. Activate one of your non-elite characters or up to 3 of your Ewok characters.

name: Glider Attack
text: Exhaust one of your Ewok characters to deal 3 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. That opponent may spend up to 3 resources to block that much damage.

flavor: "Well, short help is better than no help at all." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
name: Chief Chirpa's Hut
text: [special] - Add a set-aside Ewok Warrior ([SoH]95) to your team. Discard this support from play unless you spend 3 resources.

flavor: "I PERFORMED VIOLENCE."
name: Mr. Bones
text: After you resolve this die showing melee damage [melee], if one or more characters were just defeated, you may ready this support.

name: Ewok Bow
text: While this upgrade is on an Ewok, it gains Redeploy.

name: Han Solo's Blaster
text:
Ambush.
After you play this upgrade, you may force an opponent to remove one of their dice showing damage. Then, if this upgrade is on Han Solo, you may activate him.

name: Han Solo's Dice
text: After one of attached character's character dice rolls a blank ([blank]), you may exhaust this upgrade to reroll it. Then, if this upgrade is on Han Solo, you may ready this upgrade.

flavor: "Ee chee wa maa!"
name: Support of the Tribe
text: Spot a number of characters that share a subtype to heal that much damage from a character.

name: Fateful Companions
text: After you activate a character, you may exhaust this plot and either spot R2-D2 and C-3PO or spend 1 resource to trigger that character's "After you activate this character" ability one additional time.

name: Temporary Truce
text: You can only include Kylo Ren and Rey on your team (you can include villain and hero cards in your deck). You cannot include Gray cards in your deck.

name: Force Connection
text: Action - Exhaust this support and spot 2 Blue characters to turn one of their character dice to a side showing the same symbol as one of the other character's character dice.

name: Niman Mastery
text: Blue character only. Limit 1 form per character. After you play this upgrade, turn a character or upgrade die to any side. [special] - Turn a character and upgrade die to the sides of your choice.

name: Chain Lightning
text: Deal 1 damage to a character. Then you may spend 1 resource to deal 2 damage to another character that shares a subtype with that character.

name: Seizing Territory
text: Ambush. Spot a trooper to take control of the battlefield.

name: You Are In Command Now
text: Ambush. Play a title from your hand or discarad pile, decreasing its cost by 1 and ignoring its play restrictions.

flavor: "We're not murderers! We got what we needed, the mission was over." <cite>Iden Versio</cite>
name: Aftermath
text: After a character is defeated, you may exhaust this to gain 1 resource.

name: AT-RT
text: The modifier sides of this die can be resolved with one of your trooper dice showing any symbol.

name: Admiral
text: Leader character only. After you play this upgrade, you may spend 2 resources to ready a character or vehicle. [special] - Exhaust this upgrade to ready a character or vehicle.

name: Dead Or Alive
text: Play only if you spot a bounty hunter. After attached character is activated, you may gain 1 resource. After attached character is defeated, you may gain 1 resource.

flavor: "The director say their reconditioning process is excruciating, but effective." <cite>L3-37</cite>
name: Encircle
text: Spot 3 exhausted characters to remove all character dice.
